snippet: Mr. Kerry made the remarks during a trip to Africa and the Middle East, which Kenyan newspapers have described as a “peace mission.”...

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Kerry made the remarks during a trip to Africa and the Middle East, which Kenyan newspapers have described as a “peace mission.”

headline.main: John Kerry Calls for Speedy Deployment of South Sudan Protection Force
